## Description {#details}

Specifies the location (and size) of various objects in the minidump file.

The location is relative to the start of the file.

Definition at line 59 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/binaryformat/minidump-h">Minidump.h</a>.
